title: Wilson's Tales of the Borders and of Scotland, Volume 14
author: Various
snippet: He therefore marched forward his army, and encamped on the south bank o'the Tweed, above Berwick, at a place which historians call theBirks--which I take to be the fields lying between West Ord and NorhamCastle.
